title: Cynthia Larive - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1992, she was awarded a Ph.D. ... of Dallas L. Rabenstein. Larive began her career as a professor in the chemistry department at the University of Kansas, and later joined the faculty of the University of California, Riverside, in 2005....

title: About Cynthia Larive – Office of the Chancellor
snippet: Larive es una graduada universitaria de primera generación, que obtuvo su licenciatura en ciencias en la Universidad Estatal de Dakota del Sur y su maestría en la Universidad de Purdue, ambos diplomas en química. Recibió su Ph.D. en química analítica en la UC Riverside a la vez que criaba ...

title: UC Riverside Provost Cynthia K. Larive to become UC Santa Cruz’s 11th chancellor | University of California
snippet: Currently the provost and executive vice chancellor at UC Riverside, Larive has served the UC community for nearly a decade and a half as a faculty member, administrator and leader.

title: Provost Cynthia K. Larive | Inside UCR
snippet: UC Riverside on Facebook UC Riverside on X UC Riverside on YouTube UC Riverside on Instagram UC Riverside on LinkedIn · When Cynthia K. Larive joined UC Riverside as a bioanalytical chemistry professor in 2005, she had no aspirations of an administrative role.
